meanings.definition: Able to fit in a pocket.
meanings.sent1: The small phone is pocketable, so I can easily carry it around.
meanings.sent2: This wallet is pocketable, making it convenient for everyday use.
meanings.sent3: I tried to fit the huge book in my pocket, but only pocketable items can go in there!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were so pocketable, they could be carried around effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The tiny toy was so pocketable that it seemed like magic to keep it in my pocket.

meanings.definition: Suitable for carrying in a pocket.
meanings.sent1: The pocketable camera is perfect for capturing moments on the go.
meanings.sent2: These snacks are pocketable, ideal for a quick energy boost during hikes.
meanings.sent3: I always keep pocketable tissues handy for unexpected sneezes!
meanings.sent4: His jokes were so pocketable, they could easily lighten the mood.
meanings.sent5: The keys were so pocketable that I never had to worry about misplacing them.
